column5: accessed=31 August 2015}}</ref> - and known by the pseudonym '''Bohemian Weasel''' - is an English artist living in Portugal. Her artwork has been exhibited by [[The Tolkien Society]] and has been published by [[Topps]] in their [[The Lord of the Rings Masterpieces]] card series.

column1: She has cited Victorian illustration as an inspiration for her style,<ref name="LM"/> whilst the phrase "luminous aestheticism" has been used to describe her artwork.<ref>{{webcite

column2: Glasgow School of Art]].<ref name="BSA"/> She moved to Portugal for the warm weather where she regularly works on commissions.<ref name="SKA"/>
